name: Flick Hockey
description:
Classic Flick Hockey on your phone! Using three pucks shoot one between the other two as you make your way through the endless adventure. Hitting another puck, moving backwards, and failing to pass through the other 2 pucks ends your game so flick carefully!

Battle against friends and with the entire world to get the highest score in an endless arcade challenge. Or compete against your friends in local Versus mode and battle head to head to be the first to score a set amount of goals. Prove your worth as the worlds Flick Hockey champion of the world!

Background music sourced from freemusic.org by user joshuaempyre.
